heading: Check your answers before sending your application

remove.voluntary: Are you sure you want to remove your role at %s?
remove.employment: Are you sure you want to remove your job at %s?
remove.pension: Are you sure you want to remove your pension with %s?
remove.insurance: Are you sure you want to remove your policy with %s?
remove.condition: Are you sure you want to remove %s from your health conditions?

errors.required: Select yes if you would like to remove the details you entered for this section

removed.voluntary: Do you do any other voluntary work?
removed.pension: Are you getting any other pensions or annuities?
removed.insurance: Are you getting money from any other permanent health insurance policy?
removed.condition: Do you have another health condition, illness, disability or injury?

required.voluntary: Select yes if you do any other voluntary work
required.employment: Select yes if you have another job
required.pension: Select yes if you're getting any other pensions or annuities
required.insurance: Select yes if you're getting money from another permanent health insurance policy
required.condition: Select yes if you have another health condition, illness, disability or injury
